actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs (Formerly:  Interior and Insular Affairs)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs (Formerly:  Interior and Insular Affairs).

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.

summary.text: Establishes within the Department of the Interior an additional position of Assistant Secretary of the Interior for Indian Affairs to be responsible for such duties as the Secretary of the Interior shall prescribe with respect to Indian Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.
